title: Kijing
author: Kijing
content: We are glad to see you in our bounty thread.Join our community!http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1575289752/b34b4807/28774835.jpgWebsite | Whitepaper | Twitter | Discord | Linkedin | YouTube | Telegram | GitHub |MediumA browser is a product that is an entry point to the Internet and its users are a huge community that is committed to network transparency and self-regulation. That is why we decided to create a blockchain-based Netbox.Browser, which users are distributed around the world and are able to join their forces to create a new transparent Internet access tool. The Netbox.Global infrastructure and its key product -Netbox.Browser -are the tools in the hands of a wide community of users, each and every one of which has and exercises their right to have a free global network owned by them.Founders of Netbox.GlobalInformation on Bounty:1. Total campaign pool accounts for $50000. 2. Bounty consists of 3 MINI-CAMPAIGNS: marketing promotion on Twitter, marketing promotion on online forums and content creation campaign, as well as the “Best video and best article” CONTEST. 3. Distribution:1. Twitter Promotion Campaign – 20 %2. Forum Promotion Campaign – 20 %3. Content Creation Campaign – 20 %4. “Best video and best article: contest – 40%https://i.ibb.co/br7hkWL/image.jpg 4. Currency of payments for mini-campaigns: 80% Ethereum (ETH) and 20% NBX. 5. Currency of payments for the contest: 50% Ethereum (ETH) and 50% NBX. 6. Participants will receive payments in proportion to the rates earned in accordance with the exchange rate on the day of payment. 7. Bounty DurationWeek 1: 14/05/2022 - 20/05/2022Week 2: 22/05/2022 - 27/05/2022Week 3: 28/05/2022 - 04/06/2022Week 4: 07/06/2022 - 13/06/2022Payment: 20/06/2022 8. One participant can get not more than 10% of the pool of the campaign he participates in.Basic rules1. Each Bounty participant MUST join Telegram channels: https://t.me/Gunbounty and https://t.me/netboxglobal. 1.1.  https://t.me/netboxglobal is intended ONLY for communication about the NetBox Global project и NBX cryptocurrency. 1.2.  For all questions considering Bounty contact ONLY https://t.me/Gunbounty. 1.3.  The absence of registration in the above Telegram channel can cause participants’ disqualification from the bounty campaign and cancellation of bets for these participants. 1.4.  To get a reward, you must remain in these channels until you receive the reward. 2. No KYC.3. Use of multiple accounts is prohibited. Use of bots, spam or other types of fraud is prohibited. Anyone caught in the above violations will be excluded from the bounty and his bets will be canceled.3.1. Plagiarism is prohibited! If a bounty participant is spotted in plagiarism, a warning will be issued (“plagiarism” will be indicated in the spreadsheets). If plagiarism is re-identified in the participant’s works, the participant will be excluded from the bounty and his bets will be canceled. 3.2. Low quality posts and comments are forbidden! If a participant writes posts or comments of apparently low quality, he will be warned (“low quality” will be indicated in the spreadsheets). If low quality content is re-identified in the participant’s work, the participant will be excluded from the bounty and his bets will be canceled.4. Bounty manager reserves the right to amend the bounty conditions.5. Bounty manager is allowed to exclude any participant from the campaign due to unethical behavior or insult aimed at the project or other participants of the bounty. In this case, the bets of the excluded user will be cancelled. 6. By registration in the bounty, users indicate their payment details: ETH wallet and NBX wallet. 6.1. For NBX wallet registration you can use: Netbox web-wallet: Go to https://netbox.global/ and press DOWNLOADDownload desctop wallet: https://github.com/netboxglobal Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magnum.walletMagnum multi-wallet: https://app.magnumwallet.co 6.2. The registered wallet address cannot be replaced during the bounty process. 7. To confirm registration, you must leave a message about the "Confirmation" in this topic in the form of:#Proof AuthenticationUsername at Bitcoitnalk;ETH wallet address;NBX wallet address;Telegram nickname;Campaign in which you participate.The absence of a #Proof Authentication message confirming registration in the bounty topic is the basis for participant’s disqualification and cancellation of earned bets. 8. Please submit your weekly reports using the recommended template. No need to quote your report for the previous week.The report must include:• week number;• campaign name;• participant number in the spreadsheet; The absence of the above data in the report is a possible basis for participant’s disqualification and cancellation of earned bets.9. The report should be submitted in this topic weekly on Sunday by 23:59 (UTC+0).10. Results for the past week are checked and published by the manager within 3 days (until Wednesday inclusive). Another 3 days (until Saturday inclusive) are provided to participants to challenge the number of earned bets, bans, plagiarism or low quality content. After these deadlines, claims are not considered.https://i.ibb.co/qy0JxHm/1-1.jpg1. Your account should have at least 100 subscribers. 2. All participants should subscribe to the official NETBOX Twitter: https://twitter.com/NetboxGlobal. 3. All participants are to make at least 3 retweets from the official Twitter account of the NETBOX project on a weekly basis. Maximum amount for 1 day: 1 retweet. 4. All participants have to make at least 4 and no more than 10 comments weekly with brief information about the NETBOX project (in a positive way) and the link to @NetboxGlobal Twitter account with hashtags: #NetboxGlobal #Netbox #NBX4.1. You can post your comment tweets ONLY under tweets that are written after December 01, 2019. 5. Comment requirements: at least 150 characters (with spaces) + link to the twitter account and hashtags. 6. Language of use: language of the original post. 7. Confirmation: link to the tweet comment and a screenshot.Since messages can be deleted, in order to avoid disagreements, please confirm the completion of the task by taking screenshots and posting in the report. We recommend using special programs such as Lightshot, PicPick, FastStone Capture or similar, or use Imgur, Postimage, Radikal. Thus, in the report you will have 2 links: to the post and to the screenshot. 8. Bet distribution. 8.1. For 4 own tweet comments:100-999 subscribers: 1 bet per week.1000-1999 subscribers: 2 bets per week.2000-4999 subscribers: 3 bets per week.5000 subscribers and more: 4 bets per week. 8.2. For 10 own tweet comments:100-999 subscribers: 2 bets per week.1000-1999 subscribers: 4 bets per week.2000-4999 subscribers: 6 bets per week.5000 subscribers and more: 8 bets per week.9. Please, submit your weekly reports using the following template:Twitter Promotion CampaignWeek number: _________Twitter Link: _________Your spreadsheet number: ________Retweets:1 - (dd / mm): _____2 - (dd / mm): _____3 - (dd / mm): _____Tweets:1 - (dd / mm): _____2 - (dd / mm): _____3 - (dd / mm): _____4 - (dd / mm): _____5 - (dd / mm): _____6 - (dd / mm): _____7 - (dd / mm): _____8 - (dd / mm): _____9 - (dd / mm): _____10 - (dd / mm): _____https://i.ibb.co/g7kf8QT/APPLY-2.png  https://i.ibb.co/S5gV2YX/CHECK-SPREADSHEET-2.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/7nFHtbn/1-2.jpg1. All participants should write weekly commentary posts on cryptocurrency online forums. 2. You can write under the topics/announcements of the NETBOX project (if any) or under other various topics dedicated to ALTCOINS with brief information about the project (in a positive way) and a link to the site. 3. Comment requirements: minimum 200 characters (with spaces), indirect reference to the project in a positive manner. 4. Language of use: language of the original post. 5. Number of posts per week: at least 4 and no more than 10 posts, of which at least 4 should be on various forums. Maximum 2 posts in 1 day. 6. Confirmation: link to the post and a screenshot.Since messages can be deleted, in order to avoid disagreements, please confirm the completion of the task by taking screenshots and posting in the report. We recommend using special programs such as Lightshot, PicPick, FastStone Capture or similar, or use Imgur, Postimage, Radikal. Thus, in the report you will have 2 links: to the post and to the screenshot.7. Bet distribution:7.1. For 4 own post-comments:Post 200 characters: 1 bet per week.Post 400 characters + thematic image: 2 bets per week. 7.2. For 10 own post-comments:200 character post: 2 bets per week.400 character post + thematic image: 4 bets per week. 8. Please, submit your weekly reports using the following template:Forum Promotion CompanyWeek number: _________Your spreadsheet number: ________Post:1 - (dd / mm): _____2 - (dd / mm): _____3 - (dd / mm): _____4 - (dd / mm): _____5 - (dd / mm): _____6 - (dd / mm): _____7 - (dd / mm): _____8 - (dd / mm): _____9 - (dd / mm): _____10 - (dd / mm): _____https://i.ibb.co/g7kf8QT/APPLY-2.png  https://i.ibb.co/S5gV2YX/CHECK-SPREADSHEET-2.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/vB0ZyyJ/1-3.jpg1. Your content should be unique and pass our plagiarism test. The bounty organizer has every right to reject your work for suspected plagiarism. 2. Only articles and videos that are created and published after 12/02/2019 are accepted for the report. 3. Content topics:"History of Internet browser development"“Prospects for blockchain technology use in browsers”“General browser security issues”"Problems of user data leakage"“Perfect browser from the user point of view”“Is there anonymity of Internet users?”All of the listed topics (and related ones) can and should be used to create your own content + natively add information about the NETBOX browser, describe its unique technology and how it helps to solve the problems which Internet users face.4. Content MUST have at the end a link indicating the author’s nickname on the forum and a link to the Telegram account. This is a requirement to prevent fraud by unscrupulous participants.Video requirements: 1. The video should be at least 3 minutes, shorter videos are not accepted. 2. Video content should be native: tell about the history of the Internet and browsers, fluently and gently mention NETBOX - the NEWEST one in the history of browsers (this is the first blockchain browser in the world with the safest technology + describe aspects of White paper, browser functionality or other technical qualities of the project). 3. Videos which present a brief review of the site or White paper are considered low-quality and will not be accepted for payment! 4. The video should be posted on YouTube and have at least 100 real views at the time the report is submitted. 5. The video description should contain the following hashtags: #NetboxGlobal #Netbox #NBX #Netbox_browser and a link to the official website and social networks of the project:Site: https://netbox.globalTwitter: https://twitter.com/netboxglobalTelegram: https://t.me/netboxglobalDiscord: https://discordapp.com/invite/GCgZZPNLinkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/netboxglobal/Medium: https://medium.com/@netboxglobalYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIAUgPvyihTcsqYSM264iIgGitHub: https://github.com/netboxglobal 6. By placing a link to the video for participation in the bounty, the author (participant) agrees to transfer the video copyright to the project and does not object to its further full or partial use at the project sole discretion. 7. Participants should publish their weekly reports in the bounty English-language topic.8. Bets:Low quality: 1 bet per week.Satisfactory quality: 2 bets per week.Average quality: 3 bets per week.Good quality: 4 bets per week.High quality: 5 bets per week.9. Please, submit your weekly reports using the following template:Week number: _________Your spreadsheet number: ________Video link: _________Article requirements:1. Articles should contain at least 500 words, shorter articles are not accepted.2. Articles should be native: tell about the history of the Internet and browsers, fluently and gently mention NETBOX - the NEWEST one in the history of browsers (this is the first blockchain browser in the world with the safest technology + describe aspects of White paper, browser functionality or other technical qualities of the project). 3. Articles which present a brief review of the site or White paper are considered low-quality and will not be accepted for payment! 4. Articles should contain the following hashtags: #NetboxGlobal #Netbox #NBX #Netbox_browser and a link to the official website and social networks of the project:Site: https://netbox.globalTwitter: https://twitter.com/netboxglobalTelegram: https://t.me/netboxglobalDiscord: https://discordapp.com/invite/GCgZZPNLinkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/netboxglobal/Medium: https://medium.com/@netboxglobalYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIAUgPvyihTcsqYSM264iIgGitHub: https://github.com/netboxglobal5. Articles should be posted on Medium, Steemit or Golos. 6. By placing a link to the article to participate in the bounty, the author (participant) agrees to transfer the article copyright to the project and does not object to its further full or partial use at the project sole discretion..7. Participants should publish their weekly reports in the bounty English-language topic.8. Bets:Low quality: 1 bet per week.Satisfactory quality: 2 bets per week.Average quality: 3 bets per week.Good quality: 4 bets per week.High quality: 5 bets per week.9. Please, submit your weekly reports using the following template:Week number: _________Your spreadsheet number: ________Link to the article: _________https://i.ibb.co/g7kf8QT/APPLY-2.png  https://i.ibb.co/S5gV2YX/CHECK-SPREADSHEET-2.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/KLytQqb/1-4.jpgAmong all the participants taking part in the content creation campaign and having received “GOOD QUALITY and HIGH QUALITY” rates, an additional incentive prize will be competed for. Thus, we will stimulate the creation of high quality content. Videos:1st place - $6002nd place - $4003rd place - $200 Articles:1st place - $4002nd place - $2503rd place - $150 To participate in the competition you should submit a video/article until 12/25/2019.The jury is the NBX team.Competition results announcement - 12/30/2019https://i.ibb.co/C8k6QFT/ip-bitcointalk-org.png
